title: Retrieve data from Creatio using OAuth 2.0 authorization and DataService

rows: The URL of the Creatio instance to retrieve data.
tables.html:
Parameter

Parameter description

Parameter value

Request method

POST

Request URL

The URL of the Creatio instance to retrieve data.

http://mycreatio.com/0/DataService/json/SyncReply/SelectQuery

callouts.title: Accounts
callouts.content: ExampleRetrieve the names of all accounts from theAccountssection. Use OAuth 2.0 authorization and DataService to integrate the app with Creatio.ResponseStatus:200OK{"rowConfig":{"Id":{"dataValueType":0},"Name":{"dataValueType":1},"AccountLogo":{"dataValueType":16,"isLookup":true,"referenceSchemaName":"SysImage"}},"rows":[{"Name":"Accom (sample)","Id":"405947d0-2ffb-4ded-8675-0475f19f5a81","AccountLogo":""},{"Name":"Our company","Id":"e308b781-3c5b-4ecb-89ef-5c1ed4da488e","AccountLogo":""}],"notFoundColumns":[],"rowsAffected":2,"nextPrcElReady":false,"success":true}
callouts.html:
Example

Retrieve the names of all accounts from the Accounts section. Use OAuth 2.0 authorization and DataService to integrate the app with Creatio.

Response
Status: 200 OK

{
    "rowConfig": {
        "Id": {
            "dataValueType": 0
        },
        "Name": {
            "dataValueType": 1
        },
        "AccountLogo": {
            "dataValueType": 16,
            "isLookup": true,
            "referenceSchemaName": "SysImage"
        }
    },
    "rows": [
        {
            "Name": "Accom (sample)",
            "Id": "405947d0-2ffb-4ded-8675-0475f19f5a81",
            "AccountLogo": ""
        },
        {
            "Name": "Our company",
            "Id": "e308b781-3c5b-4ecb-89ef-5c1ed4da488e",
            "AccountLogo": ""
        }
    ],
    "notFoundColumns": [],
    "rowsAffected": 2,
    "nextPrcElReady": false,
    "success": true
}
